page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE:-2. by Katie.
page.content: On Saturday morning my mum wakes me up at 7.30am.before she catches her train to work.She is a trainee supervisor at British Home Stores in Birmingham.My brother,my dad and I have breakfast at 8.00am.After breakfast,I do the house- work and my brother tidies his bedroom At 10.30am.we go for a bicycle ride. When we return my dad reads,Matthew plays on the computer and I watch television.At 1.30pm.my dad cooks lunch.We usually have 'Sosmix',mash and peas.(Sosmix is a substitute for meat,we are vegetarians).After dinner my dad washes up and then we all have jobs to do.Matthew and I wash the car and dad chops some sticks.At about 7.15pm.my mum comes home.Then we fetch some chips from Dordon fish and chip shop.After we have eaten them,we go to bed.
